column4: hi, i need help (running dapper on amd64), i'm following this howto: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=133427 to install xgl and compiz. i've got to part 4, but am now stuck, i get the message "dpkg: operation requires read/write access to dpkg status area"
i tried sudo, i get "dpkg: error processing compiz_cvs20060218+opacityplugin-1_amd64.deb (--install): cannot access archive: No such file or directory"
you could try asking on the ubuntuforums i never installed xgl, so i dont know what the problem is
